sentences.en: A breakfast will be served to those who last out till dawn!
sentences.cn: 坚持到天亮的能吃上早餐！

sentences.en: a light breakfast
sentences.cn: 简单的早餐

sentences.en: a working breakfast
sentences.cn: 工作早餐

sentences.en: Accommodation is free — all you pay for is breakfast and dinner.
sentences.cn: 住宿免费——你只需付早餐和正餐的钱。

sentences.en: After a hearty breakfast (=  large breakfast  ) , we set out for a hike.
sentences.cn: 我们吃了一顿丰盛的早餐，然后出发去远足了。

sentences.en: After a six-mile run, Jackie returns home for a substantial breakfast.
sentences.cn: 跑了6英里之后，杰姬回家吃了一顿丰盛的早餐。

sentences.en: All the ladies breakfasted in their rooms.
sentences.cn: 所有女士在她们房间里用了早餐。

sentences.en: At nine o' clock on the dot, they have breakfast.
sentences.cn: 他们在9点钟准时吃早饭。

sentences.en: Bed and breakfast costs from £30 per person per night.
sentences.cn: 住宿加次日早餐每人每晚30英镑起。

sentences.en: Breakfast television arrived in British life precisely a decade ago.
sentences.cn: 准确地说，早间电视节目于10年前进入英国人的生活。

sentences.en: Breakfast will be a cheerless affair for the Prime Minister this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天的早餐会让首相感觉全然无味。

sentences.en: For breakfast I had a thick slice of bread and syrup.
sentences.cn: 早餐我吃了一片厚厚的涂了糖浆的面包。

sentences.en: He had a light breakfast of poached eggs and tea.
sentences.cn: 他早餐就吃了点水煮荷包蛋，喝了点茶。

sentences.en: He made his way into the dining car for breakfast.
sentences.cn: 他来到餐车车厢吃早饭。

sentences.en: I never eat breakfast .
sentences.cn: 我从来不吃早饭。

sentences.en: I'll have some breakfast ready in a few minutes.
sentences.cn: 几分钟后我就能做点儿早饭出来。

sentences.en: She tucked into a breakfast of bacon and eggs.
sentences.cn: 她大口地吃着咸肉和鸡蛋作成的早餐。

sentences.en: She was in the middle of clearing the breakfast things.
sentences.cn: 她正在忙着收拾早饭后的那一摊子。

sentences.en: Sylvia shook hands. "Well, you go get yourselves some breakfast."
sentences.cn: 西尔维娅摆了摆手说：“嗯，你们自己去吃些早餐吧。”

sentences.en: The original kitchen was sandwiched between the breakfast room and the toilet.
sentences.cn: 厨房最初夹在早餐厅和厕所之间。

sentences.en: We had bacon and eggs for breakfast .
sentences.cn: 我们早餐吃了熏肉鸡蛋。

phrases.tran_cn: 欧洲的一种简易旅馆；住宿加早餐
丰盛的早餐；精选早餐套餐
欧式早餐（仅有咖啡和果酱面包）
n. 英式早餐（熏肉、蛋、烤面包和果酱）
当作早餐；对于早餐来说
(非正式)不费吹灰之力对付（或打败）某人

trans.tran_en: the meal you have in the morning
the meal you have in the morning
